name: buy-the-colors-websockets
description: This server communicates with a browser-based board game application when: * A player is "registering" by providing their player name and waiting on other players * At the end of every player turn, the game state is sent from the browser-based application to this server, and then this server broadcasts that (updated) game state to all players * Maintaining a list of active and inactive players * Reconnecting inactive players
